meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Kirsten Morry Cody Landis Doug Dodson Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7832.

td.p: Kirsten Morry, a lawyer from St. John's, Newfoundland and Labrador, Canada
Cody Landis, a registered nurse from New York, New York
Doug Dodson, a classical singer from Boston, Massachusetts (whose 1-day cash winnings total $16,000)

tr.td: OCTOBER OBSERVANCES
SAILING INTO HISTORY
PORTUGUESE PRIMER
GEMS & JEWELS
WEIRD AL-CHEMY
(Alex: We'll give you a Weird Al song, and you tell us the artist it parodies.)
AT THE ZOO

In the 1880s, Etienne-Jules Marey developed chronophotography, in which the entire sequence of a movement was captured in a single image, inspiring the superimposed images of a figure descending a staircase in the 1912 painting by this French artist')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: (Sarah of the Clue Crew shows an example of chronophotography on the monitor.) In the 1880s, Etienne-Jules Marey developed chronophotography, in which the entire sequence of a movement was captured in a single image, inspiring the superimposed images of a figure descending a staircase in the 1912 painting by this French artist

(Alex: Yeah, okay. Correct response: who is [*]? He wrote--co-wrote Good Will Hunting, that great tender film, and produced Argo.)
KirstenWho is Day-Lewis?
$2,000
CodyWho is ?
$7,999
DougWho is backrolls?
$9,001
Ben Affleck')
